ggplot2::theme_set(hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum_rc())

attendance_standings <- readr::read_rds(here::here("content", "post", "2020-02-04-nfl-attendance", "attendance_standings.rds"))

```{r duration}
library(tidyverse)

attendance_standings %>%
  mutate(team = paste(team, team_name)) %>%
  filter(year==2003) %>%
  ggplot(aes(week, weekly_attendance)) +
  geom_step() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(~team)
```
